|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S805X; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-450; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ128DWIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = 2400 |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WB-BCRC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 18:66:C7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04;; |stockos = Linux;4.19.56;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eMMC module socket, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Micro-B) Female
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4a, CVBS header, ADC header, IR receiver, SPI, UART, GPIO, I2C, |addchip = Capless 2V to 3V Line Driver w/ Adjustable Gain;SG Micro;SGM8905;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2019 |estprice = 25 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"Libre Computer AML-S805X-AC V1.0A"'' is silkscreened on the board (near the 40-pin RPi compatible header). {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S805X @1.2GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ARM Mali-450; Memory: 1GB (DDR4-2400) RAM *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR), eMMC module socket
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/librecomputer/la-frite-open-source-fries/description ''La Frite: Open Source Fries'' on '''KickStarter'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/10/12/la-frite-amlogic-s805x-board-mainline-linux/ ''La Frite Amlogic S805X Board Runs Mainline Linux'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
==See also== ===Models=== :;[[Libre Computer]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[Libre Computer Alta]] (AML-A311D-CC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, AI Accelerator *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB, [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B074P6BNGZ --> *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078RMQYHS --> *[[Libre Computer Renegade Elite]] (ROC-RK3399-PC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Solitude]] (AML-S905D3-CC) • 2GB/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0
*[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC IoT H2+) • 512MB, 32-bit *[[Libre Computer Tritium H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB, 32-bit • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB, 64-bit <!-- https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07D4KTRWR -->
[[Category:English Documentation]]
